com.purkkapussi.sinkdashipz.domain

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.purkkapussi.sinkdashipz.domain.Game

  • public class Game
extends Object
    Class contains the main game functionality, including tracking player and AI progress and shooting.
    Author:
    ile

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game(int gameboard,
            GraphicalUI gui)
        Main Game constructor. Initializes a new game with the given game board size.
        Parameters:
        gameboard - size of the game board
        gui - Graphical UI to be used.

      • Game

        public Game(int gameboard,
            HighScoreHandler handler)
        Constructor used in testing.
        Parameters:
        gameboard - game board size
        handler - HighScoreHandler

    • Method Detail

      • startGame

        public void startGame()
        Method starts a new game with the default rule set and creates randomized fleets for both the AI and the Player.

      • endgame

        public void endgame()
        Method used to end the game. Method adds the players score to high scores, writes the high scores to file and sets endgame variable to true;

      • addRandomFleets

        public void addRandomFleets()
        Method creates randomized fleets for both the player and the AI.

      • playerShoot

        public void playerShoot(Location loc)
        Player shooting method. The method will fire at the given location. If a hit is scored, appropriate message is shown and the player is given points. If AI's fleet size hits 0, the game ends with the endgame() method. If the player misses, appropriate message is shown and points deducted and aiShoot() method called.
        Parameters:
        loc - Location to shoot at

      • aiShoot

        public void aiShoot()
        AI shooting method, called after player misses a shot. Method request a location from the AI-class for every shot and will keep on firing until a miss happens. If the player's fleet gets destroyed, endgame method is called.

      • getEndgame

        public Boolean getEndgame()
        Returns:
        true if game has ended

      • getPlayer

        public Player getPlayer()
        Returns:
        Player object of the current game

      • getAI

        public AI getAI()
        Returns:
        AI object of the current game

      • getWinner

        public String getWinner()
        Returns:
        the name of the winner of the current game

      • getPlayerRank

        public int getPlayerRank()
        Method returns player's rank versus those already in high scores
        Returns:
        rank of the player versus previous high scores

      • tenBestHighScores

        public String tenBestHighScores()
        Method returns a string consisting of the top 10 High Scores
        Returns:
        top ten high scores separated by line change
